doc.title: Naval Parade on the Delaware River, Monday, May 1st, in Honor of Admiral Dewey
doc.plot: Here we show the Naval Parade on the Delaware River, Philadelphia, in celebration of Dewey Day, May 1st, 1899. Hundreds of pleasure and tug boats are plainly seen gliding around the United States Cruiser Raleigh, and thousands of persons are seen waving their hats as she salutes. Philadelphia City Hall tower is plainly seen in the distance.
